group-item.label: Referral Hospital (MOH)
group-item.description: Health facility were general care diagnostic services, limited surgical procedure and access to specialist consultation for patients referred from health centers are being provided

group-item.label: National Hospital (MOH)
group-item.description: Health facility providing the same services as a referral hospital as well as a range of more highly specialized services

group-item.label: Health Post (MOH)
group-item.description: Health facility were only primary health care are being provided

group-item.label: Health Centre (MOH)
group-item.description: Health facility were enhanced level of care is being provided
